definition: station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website
to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks

sentences.english: The opinion does not survive experience of a popular Continental camping place.
sentences.chinese: 但這種說法在受人歡迎的歐洲露營地是站不住腳的。

sentences.english: The researches of these scholars have shown that the old theory is untenable.
sentences.chinese: 這些學者的研究表明那個舊學說是站不住腳的。

sentences.english: But another official said such assertions are groundless.
sentences.chinese: 但另一名官員說，這種斷言是站不住腳的。

sentences.english: To argue otherwise is trying to defend the indefensible.
sentences.chinese: 持相反的論點就是試圖爲站不住腳的事情強辯。

sentences.english: None of his arguments seemed to me to hold water.
sentences.chinese: 對我來說，他所有的論點都是站不住腳的。

sentences.english: It was easy to pick holes in his flimsy argument.
sentences.chinese: 在他那番站不住腳的論點中找漏洞是很容易的。

sentences.english: I'm not prepared to listen to your weak excuses.
sentences.chinese: 我不想聽你那站不住腳的藉口。
這個論點是站不住腳的。

sentences.english: The claim that the crisis was due to insufficient regulation is also unconvincing.
sentences.chinese: 危機是由於監管不足的說法也站不住腳。

sentences.english: The Lawyer may refuse to undertake a case which appears to him unsound.
sentences.chinese: 律師可能拒絕承辦他認爲站不住腳的案件。

sentences.english: But the proportion of that increase ascribable to renminbi appreciation is very much debatable.
sentences.chinese: 但把增長歸結於人民幣的升值那就太站不住腳了。
這個信念也許是站不住腳的。

sentences.english: Prejudice and lies are untenable and the Cold War mentality has no popular support.
sentences.chinese: 他表示，偏見和謊言站不住腳，冷戰思維不得人心。

sentences.english: Most of the arguments put forward by our opponents simply do not hold water.
sentences.chinese: 我們的對手提出的大部辯白解都站不住腳。

sentences.english: This disproves the theory that children are purely imitative.
sentences.chinese: 這證明認爲兒童只會單純地模仿的理論是站不住腳的。
